question: International Energy Agency announced that lockdown in India has led to 30% fall in the country's energy demand.  Where is the headquarters of IEA located?
explanation:
According to the recent statement from the International Energy Agency (IEA), the 40-day long lockdown has resulted in a 30% fall in the country's energy demand. It also added that with each additional week of lockdown, annual energy demand gets reduced by 0.6%.
IEA, headquartered at Paris, France has also opined that this is the biggest shock since the Second World War and the global energy demand will also drop heavily this year. There has also been a dip in global carbon emissions, as per the agency.
